value:
$nMPID_比翼アスク|Ringing in the new year with Heroes
of all sorts in attendance is a fitting
celebration for the Kingdom of Askr!

$nMPID_比翼アスク|Embla, there was once a time that
you, too, enjoyed celebrating the new
year with mortals. I've not forgotten!

$nMPID_比翼アスク|Look, Embla... They play a game in
which the victor may draw on the
face of their opponent!$k$pWhich of the many worlds did that
one tradition come from, I wonder...

$nMPID_エンブラ|Mortals... Ever the self-centered
creatures, abandoning what they
leave behind without a thought...$k$pWhy celebrate what is to come?
It will surely fall by the wayside
soon enough.

$nMPID_エンブラ|Given even the slightest opportunity,
Askr cannot help but succumb to his
desire to speak to me... It never ends.

Happy New Year's! May your bond
with $Nf flourish!

$nMPID_エンブラ|I will mark this new year upon the
face of whoever is foolish enough
to face me! Hm-hm-hmh-ha-hah...

$nMPID_比翼アスク|Good fortune comes to those who
enter the new year with a smile!
So...will you join me, Embla?

$nMPID_エンブラ|This...this is the true nature of the
coming year...

$nMPID_エンブラ|Wh-what is your aim here? Do you
think some meager tribute would be
enough to change my heart?

Happy New Year! I look forward to
all the new faces we will meet in the
new year! Don't you agree, Embla?

$nMPID_比翼アスク|It seems that making a New Year's
resolution is a way to determine a
path for the coming year...$k$pWhat do you intend to make of your
year, Embla?$k$p$nMPID_エンブラ|What does it matter? My mind is filled
with thoughts of the inevitability of
mortals perishing as I look on...$k$p$nMPID_比翼アスク|Ah! So you plan to use this coming
year to watch over them? I always
knew you were gentle at heart!$k$p$nMPID_エンブラ|No, you misunderstand... I would
never put forth such effort for the
sake of mortals...$k$pI wish only to be closed away—away
from interaction with everyone and
everything. And yet, with you...$k$pBeing in your presence makes me
feel as if I am losing my mind...$k$p$nMPID_比翼アスク|I do wish that you have a wonderful
year, Embla. Truly, from the bottom
of my heart.
$nMPID_二人|Happy New Year!
$nMPID_二人|A new year... Closes in.
$nMPID_比翼アスク|Felicitations!
$nMPID_エンブラ|I care not.
Alas and alack...
Further...
Do not ruin this.
"Happy..." "New Year."
"Vile!" "Easy, now..."
"There's the Embla I know!" "Stop talking."
Enough.
My pleasure.
Ugh, how miserable...
$nMPID_エンブラ|Hm-hm-hmh-ha-hah...

$nMPID_比翼アスク|Enjoying yourself, are we, Embla?
Care to let me in on the joke?
$nMPID_エンブラ|These mortal fools...so peculiar...

With their short lives, every new
year is one step closer to death.

Yet still they celebrate each year
all the same! How can you not
laugh at them?

$nMPID_比翼アスク|They are making the most of what
time they do have by celebrating!

Their celebration is beautiful!
Though, I understand it must
leave you feeling lonely...
$nMPID_エンブラ|It does no such thing.

$nMPID_比翼アスク|I know you, Embla. I know you have
always loved the mortals. You cherish
them, yearn to keep them close...

Because their lives are short, you
fear a future where they step out
of your reach.
$nMPID_エンブラ|Ridiculous! I would never.

Do not pretend to know me better
than I know myself.

$nMPID_比翼アスク|I would not go so far as to say I do.
I simply know the part of your heart
you've closed off and hidden away.

Be it this year, next year, or some
year far in the future, I will reach
that part of you again someday.

But until that day comes, I have faith
your true self is in there—and that
I will meet her again.
$nMPID_エンブラ|Askr, you...are completely unbearable.

$nMPID_比翼アスク|Hah! So I may be! Let us celebrate
that as well!
